channel.title: Dds-specz :o
channel.description: Who else misses Dds-Specz and would like to play it again? D:

item.title: Dds-specz :o
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Whichever one had the money tree was boss. You just had to log on at around 2 in the morning to get to it without dying.

Read full topic

item.title: Dds-specz :o
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:23, topic:405194”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=502189.msg3674573#msg3674573 date=1311168938]
I’m prolly thinking of a different dds-specz. I don’t remember clicking shit like you guys are talking about.
[/quote]

We’re not talking about dds specz, we’re having a nostalgia moment about that other server where u spawned in west varrock bank and had to mass click stuff like hay bales, doors, etc. The max level for a skill was like 140 or something and people would always barrage you when you tried to take the 1m cash piles that spawned in the open.[/quote]

The mass clicking stuff sounds familiar but I don’t remember the barraging.

Read full topic

Are you tom I played on minecraft with too?

item.title: Dds-specz :o
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:405194”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=502189.msg3674037#msg3674037 date=1311127067]
And this was before servers had like kill counts, and starter kits and stuff. The only source of money was like 10m that spawned in prime barrage territory haha So the barragers literally gained nothing from killing you.
[/quote]
Oh yea it always on the grass… Oh man that was epic.
I remember people hitting like 120’s with torag’s too… It was always torag v ahrims[/quote]
Those who were ballsy enough could take on the KBD which was next to the bank in that little opening or w/e. The party hats in the varrock fountain surrounded by sharks that attacked you, and party hats on top of the columns of the museum haha

Read full topic

[/quote]
Sprint of hell from the bank to the dummy room, because everything but those 2 posts was pvp? haha[/quote]
I remember this. You would always have barragers ready to attack you.
